com.xin.popgen.infos

Class GenoInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xin.popgen.infos.CountInfo
      • com.xin.popgen.infos.VcfInfo
        • com.xin.popgen.infos.GenoInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Info

    public final class GenoInfo
extends VcfInfo
    Class GenoInfo is used for counting alleles from genotype file in EIGENSTRAT format.
